website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for customers wanting a longer kitchen mat crafted from soft fabric and memory foam.
pros: Memory foam mat constructed to keep its shape
Fabric is water absorbent for splashes and spills
Impressively low price despite its extra-large design
cons: Tends to slip around on floor
Microfiber tends to attract dust and dirt

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to place outside my master bathroom shower and it great. Nice and soft. Alot cheaper than other similar ones.
customer_reviews.author: wudini007

customer_reviews.title: No slip - memory long rug ..
customer_reviews.text: I got these mats for my 16 year old dog to walk on without slipping . They are great ! The pads on his paws are practically gone and these give him the non slip surface he needs . They are soft and awesome! We love them . I have a couple for my bathroom also and they are very nice .
customer_reviews.author: lisalisa38

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use in the backseat of my car for my Boxer. The hammock I bought him is a bit slippery, so I thought this would give him some grip and a little cushion. It's a perfect fit for my Altima and does exactly what I hoped it would! I'll admit, I almost kept it for my bathroom, but decided I'll just buy another one! I got it in the grey and it's a deep charcoal; very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! The size is amazing and it is SO soft! I bought one for in front of my sink and just bought another one for in front of my oven!! Also thinking about getting another one for my bathroom! Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frugal Shopper
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my bathroom and man oh man its so soft. when you get it, it does not have any weird smells that's a plus. I've had it for about a month now and have washed it twice with out an issue and put it in the dryer on either air dry or low heat. It still looks as new. I have no issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pj Jackson

customer_reviews.title: These rugs are wonderful. We have one in front of our patio ...
customer_reviews.text: These rugs are wonderful. We have one in front of our patio door and our dog lays on it and looks outside and it also helps when he is going in and out to catch all the stuff he tracks in. It has been washed twice and then I lay it in the bathtub to dry overnight. The other rug is on the side of our bed. It helps to keep my husband from slipping when trying to get in and out of bed. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SDOWDEN

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have a kitchen mat already, get this one.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what to say. It works and works well. I love how it absorbs water so my socks don't get wet in the kitchen. It feels nice standing there whenever I'm doing food prep or dishes. Nice little purchase for a kitchen if you don't have a mat yet. It's also a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mat is great. It is very cushiony
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great. It is very cushiony. It is longer than I expected. It extends beyond the sink on both sides. I recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these mats for Christmas to go in front of my kitchen sink. My kitchen floor is tile which is hard and cold when standing for extended times. This mat cushions my feet and keeps them warm. Love it so much I ordered another one to go in front of my stove.
customer_reviews.author: Reta C.

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth 20 bucks dude. I am a 29 year old stay at home mom..with mild scoliosis they never caught when I was younger..So needless to say, I'm constantly running around cleaning with my feet and lower back hurting. I find myself just going over to my kitchen sink just to walk over it even when I'm not doing dishes because it's so comfy. They are great for my bathrooms too. Repel water and are just a great purchase. You won't be disappointed. I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome size, and I love how thick and comfy it feels
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for the bathroom by the shower. It’s super plush and I’ve washed it several times already and it looks like new still. Thrilled to have purchased this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rayray

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because of all the good reviews, but I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the good reviews, but I was skeptical. How could something so thin be so comfortable? Well it is! It's like walking on a cloud, and so easy to care for. One of my favorite purchases, and I'll be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Will probably buy more.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to catch water that falls from the kitchen sink, and counter when in use. I love that it is very soft and poofy under the feet, it catches the water, and is mostly waterproof, it doesn't just soak in all the water. If using this on a hard wood flooring, you will need floor mat grips for it obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Lovely rug.
customer_reviews.text: Really, really nice rug. It fits and works perfectly in my bathroom. The rug is thick (I didn't measure exactly, but it looks like about 1/2" thick) and feels great on my feet. It doesn't slip on my bathroom floor and the brown color matches my bathroom colors. I think it would be a little narrow for a kitchen, but it is perfect for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L.

customer_reviews.title: comfy and absorbent rug
customer_reviews.text: i’ve only had it for a week but i like it. it saves me from having to wipe the floor every time water drips. oh, and it’s very comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: mahal kiita

customer_reviews.title: The texture is great and it is high quality
customer_reviews.text: This brown kitchen mat fits my kitchen very well. The size is the same as what it is described on the website. The texture is great and it is high quality. It is worthy to buy this. I will recommend this product to my friends if they need a kitchen mat.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: My daughter bought this KMAT and she really likes it ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this KMAT and she really likes it. Her job keeps her on her feet all day. When it comes to standing longer to get dinner ready in the kitchen, I know she would not be without it! She has tried other mats, but this one is a keeper! Thank You for making these available and so affordable,.
customer_reviews.author: Art by Creed

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a reasonable price. It feels soft and firm when you stand on it. You can stand on it for a very long time and your feet do not feel tired. Love this mat very much. It is long enough for my bathroom, you can also put it in your kitchen and anywhere you want. Really good product. I will recommend this mat to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: CP658

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to cover the space below my sink to my stove. Great product and even better price. Extra comfortable on the feet and looks great in my kitchen. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at  all the good reviews?
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when this arrived. I totally rely on reviews, being a big reviewer myself. I don’t know how this got so many positive reviews. I must’ve been the only one that got a “Dud” They were smashed in a small box and folded like crazy. One of the rugs is defective and will not flatten out. There was an odor to these that was unbearable and the measurements are smaller than specified. Totally disappointed and unhappy with these and I do not recommend getting them
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: A lightweight bathroom mat
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I wanted to like this but it’s kinda cheap looking. It’s also totally meant for a bathroom, not a kitchen. It’s a soft, fabric bathroom mat. It’s a nice color and really cushiony but it doesn’t lay flat and is really lightweight so it moves around easily. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Easy trip hazard. Not ideal for kitchens as it is fabric. Update: 2/24/2020 I have been asked to change my review or delete it after receiving a couple free gifts. While I don't appreciate being harrassed weekly to change a review, I do appreciate their willingness to offer customer support with a poor product. I will not change my 2 star review. The rug was not good for kitchens and I'd like others to know that. After reporting the seller to Amazon and threatening legal issues, they finally stopped harassing me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: NOT ANTI FATIGUE
customer_reviews.text: This is not an anti-fatigue mat. It is just a long narrower bath memory foam mat. The title in description is very misleading. I am thoroughly disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ABD

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Durable
customer_reviews.text: Due to the price of this, I wasn't expecting the world but boy was I shocked when this arrived. It's thicker than I expected for the price and very durable. I use this in my kitchen in front of my sink. It's so comfortable that even my dogs like it. It also holds up under, dog daycare activities.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Money's Worth
customer_reviews.text: I do not expect a $2000 item for 20 cents. The dimensions are as described. From what I can tell this will turn out to be a long-lasting mat, with machine washings and hang drys. As most similar products, the backing is designed to grip the floor and I will not be placing it down on any freshly mopped floors. They will usualy end up sticking to the ground, only to be removed with a tedious session of spraying with petroleum-based adhesive remover and scraping. In summary, I feel satisfied that I got about a $30 product for $19.99.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hensen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how much I loved this mat. I'm a stay at home mom so I spend a long time on my feet, recently i started to feel some pain in my feet since i got this mat i feel that i can stand for some time on my feet without feeling this pain. I also wash the dishes i don't really use the dish washer that often and it doesn't really make me feel that's it wet or anything. Also it's not too wide but enough for the sink's area and i already have a big kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are the very best, softest and most absorbent bathroom rugs and bath mats I have ever owned. The memory foam makes them very comfortable to stand on. I only have one very minor complaint. The cut out on the toilet mat is not quite wide enough to properly fit around the base of my toilet, but I have managed to make do. Outstanding product, and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: SFDennis

customer_reviews.title: GOOD MATS...
customer_reviews.text: Next time I have to pay better attention to dimensions. The length is perfect for the one counter in the kitchen and also for the front of the kitchen sink. My problem is the width...pretty narrow. Aside from this, they are comfortable to stand on, I use a carpet sweeper at the end of the day, and surprisingly, as of yet, I have not spilled anything on them!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one and came back for a second because we loved it so much. However this came in a smashed box with the original packaging torn and ripped. Not sure we will keep it. Very disappointed!! ***UPDATED REVIEW***: A representative from the company contacted me and made everything right. They are very focused on customer satisfaction and went out of their way to make sure I was happy with my purchase. I am keeping the rug, and would buy from this company again!! Thank You !!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Gave back aches when you stood on it ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Gave back aches when you stood on it and it kept slipping. Thew it away in two days. Waste.
customer_reviews.author: Talin

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat fits perfectly along the length of our tub in a tiny bathroom. The brown color and stitching blend nicely with our vinyl wood flooring, and cushion is extremely comfortable to stand on. It is so much better than the two cotton mats we had before!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Washing instructions say to hand wash yet tumble dry or “lay flat for no delay” lol whatever that means. They kind of have a chemical smell at first but they’re super soft. I went ahead and machine washed and tumble dried and they take forever to dry. Have only washed once so far so I can’t attest to the longevity of quality by machine washing but I feel like hand washing is out of the question and need to be sanitized often.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Ho

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: Thick and soft. Does its job well. Only issue is it doesn't lay fully flat on the floor. The padding underneath lifts it up a little, so I trip on it sometimes. Otherwise, it serves its purpose well. PS: I don't use it on wet floor.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Reliability and softness and safety!@
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest mat I have purchased. I put it in front of my kitchen cabinets and loved it sooo much I ordered another! 😄 Hopefully it will last quite a while. I am hoping anyway. Looks like it will. I want more. Make it in more colors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha W.

customer_reviews.title: looks nice and feels nice.
customer_reviews.text: not as thick as i was expecting but thick enough. some have commented about it being a tripping hazard.. i have had no issue. lift your feet up people! easy to vacuum too. not as absorbant as other mats, but the comfort is more imporant to me.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bless

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kitchen mats
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy these kitchen mats...they could also be used in a bathroom setting as they are so soft on the feet. They relieve fatigue when standing at the sink for periods of time doing dishes or food prep. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tina W.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable kitchen mat
customer_reviews.text: We have a slate kitchen floor and love to cook, so standing to do so in our kitchen can get very tiring. These mats are very comfortable to stand on, and have definitely eased the pain!! Now if I could just get my dog to lie down somewhere else!! She has discovered their extreme comfort as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. It started with me getting a small one as a gift which I placed in my bathroom (small room with shower and toilet) so I decided to buy a longer one for my bathroom where my his/her sinks are. Super comfy to stand on as I blow out hair! :)
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs water you missed in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: I wipe down with a wash rag before exiting the shower. However, there is still water on my legs and feet that drips on to the bath mat. This keeps my bathroom dry and the softness is nice after the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Viper Green

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: After a few bad deals on rugs I just have to write this review . I use my rug by my bedside and its great being very soft and I did know that I would be using my little hand held vac , to clean it daily because of my shedding dog but its holding up just fine , because of the color ( chocolate brown ) I knew it was going to be a pain in the butt to keep presentable but its worth it . Great Rug !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Coberly

customer_reviews.title: Worthy the price.I love the brown color!
customer_reviews.text: Soft worthy and beautiful.Updating my review.I had a little issue with my mat before with the smell on it.The seller took care about it.She sent me a new mat.The mat is beautiful especially the brown color.The material is good.Worthy the price.
customer_reviews.author: Victor H.

customer_reviews.title: Durability is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I not only love this, but everyone who goes in my bathroom & steps on it, wants to take it home with them. Dries quickly after showering, & washes beautifully. Maybe not necessary but I did hang to dry. I do that for most things. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Not great for outside the shower.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and great feel! However, not great for placement outside of the shower. My hubby and I shower daily and it’s not serving its purpose. It is great/comfortable for giving our baby a bath...but ultimately I had to remove it from the bathroom because it’s just soaked underneath the mat after exiting the shower :*(
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I have been happy with this rug in my kitchen. Its easy to clean and helps give a little cushion when standing at the sink. Part of the trim around the edge starting coming off fairly soon but overall still a good rug for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A E

customer_reviews.title: One problem
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with the kitchen mat you sent me. My dog loves it too and I have to make him get off when I am using the kitchen so there is room for me. So easy to stand on and washable too! I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Marj

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have cats.
customer_reviews.text: Traps cat hair and litter like a bitch. We have to deep clean it weekly. We have a cat who likes sleeping on this more than her own bed so you know it’s comfy. It just traps dirt so well like I swear it just sticks to the thing. I really wish it wasn’t like that
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: After several washes the padding moves together into a ball making it unusuable
customer_reviews.text: was great at the beginning, but after a few washes the padding got displaced and I just washed it again and it came out with all the padding in a single ball in the middle of the matt, about the size of a grapefruit, totally unusable now I'll have to throw away. I'd advise not buying this mat if you want something last more than a few washes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product is probably decent but it was packaged so poorly I can't imagine they will ever lay flat. Also box was too small so it was quadruple taped and had particles all over the top rug...so dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: Very cushiony. Second time ordering. First set lasted 2 1/2 years, through several washings in my condo size washing machine. Saves my husband’s feet, as he does all the cooking.
customer_reviews.author: wahinelady

customer_reviews.title: GET IT
customer_reviews.text: Between having a husband, toddler, and two dogs I feel like I'm always in the kitchen. I have Multiple Sclerosis which causes some serious aches and tightness in my body. The difference this rug makes for me is night and day. I can really feel the difference in my ankles when I'm standing in one place for a significant amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this, the long one fits perfectly in front of my double sinks. The others also fit where they are suppose to fit. I love these going to get more for other bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: rorens

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It is an ok bath mat, very soft and cushy. I have a tiny bathroom so it covers a good part of the floor as both a mat for the bath and toilet. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Ebookmaven

customer_reviews.title: Slip
customer_reviews.text: I have almost fallen a million times because the water builds at the bottom and the mat slips out from beneath you. It does not stick to the floor at all. I’m tossing it and buying a standard mat
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Simone

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and are two different shades of gray.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of two mats for my bathroom and they are two different colors of gray, they should be a matching set, so not happy with that at all, to me these were expensive for what they are. But they are very soft and feel like they will hold up until I can actually go shopping at the store again in person after the lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kitchen Mat
customer_reviews.text: Replaced kitchen sink throw rug with this mat and love it! Super soft, supportive memory foam, nice channels and excellent price. Would like more colors for other areas in home.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Shop

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug
customer_reviews.text: Got this rug for in front of my kitchen sink. It is a nice rug. I really like the length but I have two memory foam rugs in my bathroom and your feet just sink into the rug. This rug is soft but if I did not have the other rugs to compare to this would have been five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marvelous

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is very soft, it's so nice to stand on when I'm doing the dishes, definitely helps! Sweeps up well, I haven't had to scrub it yet but I imagine it would clean up well
customer_reviews.author: Ndroid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome feel and comfort for the feet.. Not slippery at all
customer_reviews.text: The feel and comfort is top notch.. so soft for the feet.. absorbency level is good too.. mainly for the bathroom floor it's not slippery.. stays in place even with kids running around on it.
customer_reviews.author: Smartshoppers

customer_reviews.title: Probably won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: it's suitable for the price, nice product. i ordered a second. Update- After couple months of use strings are popping up down creases on 2 that I ordered. I live alone so not heavy traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rugs stay wet for a very long time!
customer_reviews.text: These rugs stay wet for a very long time! Whenever we take a shower or bath and get any water on them it will still be wet the next day! I often have to pick them up and lay them over the tub to dry out. I did not expect a bathroom rug to do this. I wish I could return them and get something different but I missed my window to return them. So I am sure I will buy something else and just throw these away. I am disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Seale

customer_reviews.title: Long super soft bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this rug. It fits perfectly along the tub and offers a wide area to stand while exiting the shower. The color is a rich dark coffee brown and the feel is very plush.
customer_reviews.author: Aubs

customer_reviews.title: Looks as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just as it looks on your screen. It's actually the perfect length by width for my guest bathroom in my condo. It matches well with the light gray walls and is quite soft/plush.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Although it is comfortable on the feet, it easily shows dirt and is difficult to vacuum because it is so lightweight. The rug moves easily on the floor. I chose the brown color to match the kitchen tile, and that may be why dirt shows up readily.
customer_reviews.author: Onthophagus

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Item came in good time and in good condition. It's soft and eases strain on one, while in the kitchen at the sink. Doesn't move too much. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great floor mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. Just received it yesterday. One of the reasons I purchased this was because it stated the thickness is just as an iPhone. When I put my phone on the floor I was able to close bathroom door without interruption. Now with the mat on the floor I can’t close it. Other than that everything is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Grabovica

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these (5) to protect my couches from the dogs. Must be dried without heat or line dry. They stay on the leather couch, and if we put them on the hardwood floor the dogs choose to lay on the floor. I am satifed
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Mansk

customer_reviews.title: Great rug set.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bathroom rugs. They are so soft and absorbent. The price is right for the high quality. I will order in a different color for second bathoon.g re eat
customer_reviews.author: Hyla Deane

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery, quality not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the item. Not very plush and looked very inexpensive. I was going to return, but instead, used in a small bathroom not used much in our home. The color was good, just looked cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Gets dirty..hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: It is very cushy, but the material is a bad choice for the kitchen. It gets dirty all the time.
customer_reviews.author: CBCalvert

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Soft. All that is said about this product is true is
customer_reviews.text: Great mats. I needed a smaller brown one . My bathroom door will not close because mat is to thick.I just did my own alteration to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice it's very soft and cushy I want it through my whole house very easy to clean wipe off if I spill vacuum it to get stuff off would definately recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: just like it says
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug of my bathroom. It fits very well and is long which i like. It reaches all across the floor by my tub and no matter where you get out of the tub, you are stepping on the mat!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Salokangas

customer_reviews.title: Treat for the feet.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much I've ordered a 2nd one to complete my sink/stove run. Soft & cushiony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kid bath time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! Got it for in front of our soaking tub for when our kids take baths. Soaks up all the splashes they make! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Amazing rugs - seriously. My feet is in love. So comfy and soft. Love them! They hold up their shape in thebwasher and dryer too. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicGal

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much, I ordered another mat for the 2nd bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: It feels great any time I step on this mat. Looks great in the bathroom. I liked them so much, I ordered another mat for the 2nd bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: JFish

customer_reviews.title: KMat
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've had this mat for a couple of weeks and so far so good. The main reason I bought this is I didn't want it to move around our bathroom floor, it doesn't and we love the soft cushy feel when we step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E. Pasternak

customer_reviews.title: Item exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mat for the kitchen in my new home so it would protect hardwood floor near sink. It feels great to stand on and doesn't slide around. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: joann

customer_reviews.title: I love these mats
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar expensive one that I bought for my bathroom at BB&B. This rug is less expensive and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Doggylove

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth A Darn
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart when washed and I have a mess in the washing machine and the other rugs in there are covered with the mess. Biggest waste of money EVER on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie, Murfreesboro TN

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect for my kitchen. I have one in front of the sink where I do my food prep and one in front of my range where I stand while cooking. They make standing for long periods much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Byers

customer_reviews.title: nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Loving my KMAT 47" x 17" long soft foam mat! It came inclosed in a nice zippered see-through bag. The dark brown color works perfectly for the bedroom area where it lays next to the bed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Comfortable and Washable Mat
customer_reviews.text: Lets start with the fact that I have 3 dogs and a cat that all like to lay on this Mat. I can't blame them as is feels amazing on the feet. I have this set up in my kitchen. It has taken many spills and a lot of use. I have washed it multiple times and it has retained both it's form and comfort. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: This is really soft!!! I have scoliosis, so it reduces strain on my back. Haven't cleaned it yet, but I'm hoping it withstand the test of time...
customer_reviews.author: Bibbie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Anything that goes on this comes right off. I just sweep it off. The one before this one i had to vaacum not this one. Doesn't move everywhere on the floor which is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: M a r i a h

customer_reviews.title: Best Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Such a bargain, using this carpet in front of kitchen sink! Great size and does not slip or slide! Buy it, won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Rob L.

customer_reviews.title: Met our needs but....
customer_reviews.text: The mat could be wider. Otherwise nice product. Also, we had a similar product that was much longer and wider. Impossible to find that size again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank F. Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Anti-Slip, Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our kitchen by the sink and I always make sure to slip my shoes off before standing on it because it's worth the comfort. The bottom is ant-slip so it's kind of difficult to clean. I imagine if it was gross enough you could just spray it down with a hose and let it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wash and dry good they are a bit slimmer then the ones I buy else wear but a good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Marlbrough

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a bit wider. I used them cause my clumsy dog slips a lot on the hardwood floor, so I have this laying around so he can jump from one to another without slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Cruddest

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Great rug for the price. Wish it was a little wider but overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft and squishy. Tends to move across the floor instead if staying in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft. Low profile is perfect for low clearance doors. And it didn’t arrive creased like other mats I had previously ordered and returned.
customer_reviews.author: bettylouleon

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice bath rug.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! The size is perfect and the color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely cushioned, good size for shower and bath
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and the cold matched well which is often not the case with these products. It is nice underfoot and I love the length. Can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: One of the hardest to manipulate. Holds well, but slides around quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned because the way the mats were folded they weren’t laying flat. It took a couple days for them to flatten out. They work great! Super soft, my dog will come and lay on the longer mat while I get ready for work. Water absorbs well. Easy to clean, I have ran the vacuum over them a couple times. I haven’t had the need to wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Arrant

customer_reviews.title: Shows dirt & crumbs
customer_reviews.text: Really does not make standing more comfortable. Since it is brown, it shows all the crumbs that fall from the counter
customer_reviews.author: Benita Ross

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is awesome! I have it on the hardwood floor where I get out of bed and is super soft to step on after a nights rest. It does not slide around, therefore I do not have worry about sliding across the floor. My dog also really appreciates a nice soft place to sit down in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set of rugs
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is a memory foam fan so these were a must. These rugs fit wonderfully in both of our bathrooms and look nice. Perfect touch and nice neutral color. Feels great on the feet. No complaints, I recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

product_meta.title: KMAT 47" x 17" Long Anti-Fatigue Memory Foam Kitchen Mats Bathroom Rugs Extra Soft Non-Slip Water Resistant Rubber Back Anti-Slip Runner Area Rug for Kitchen and Bathroom Brown
feature_bullets: ❤ KMAT kitchen mat is 100% Machine washable, anti-deformation ,dry fast and easy handling.
❤ Quick Water Absorbent & Water Seepage Prevention.Keep your kitchen clean and tidy,time-saving and convenient.
❤ Fine and Smooth Brown Flannel cover with a durable delicate stitching. The SBR non-slip rubber underlay, anti-slip on the various surface, do not hurt the floor.
❤ Inside with thick and density Memory Foam, soft and bouncy , cushion your feet mostly comfortably. Cold insulation and sound-proofing.

❤ Extra Long with size up to 47" x 17" x 0.78" (L x W x H).Perfect mat to stand in front of sink to do cleaning or prepping meals.Plus,Smart Useful Purposes for bathroom, kitchen, living room,meeting room,study room,corridor,bedroom, balcony, sliding room, laundry room, indoor&outdoor etc.
